CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 8, 1945. pg. 21, reads: "DAWN BOY - Calvin Lamar, leading character in operetta being presented at Herron Hill High, Friday. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Calvin Lamar wearing Native American inspired costume with loincloth, shooting bow and arrow from painted rocks, on stage for production of operetta "Dawn Boy" at Herron Hill Junior High School
